import React from 'react'; import './Battle.css'; // Import the CSS file const Battle = ({ playerPokemon, opponentPokemon, battleResult, onStartNewBattle }) => { return (

Battle

Stats Comparison:

Stat {playerPokemon.name} {opponentPokemon.name} Winner
HP {playerPokemon.stats.hp} {opponentPokemon.stats.hp} {battleResult.hp}
Attack {playerPokemon.stats.attack} {opponentPokemon.stats.attack} {battleResult.attack}
Defense {playerPokemon.stats.defense} {opponentPokemon.stats.defense} {battleResult.defense}
Speed {playerPokemon.stats.speed} {opponentPokemon.stats.speed} {battleResult.speed}

{battleResult.winner}

); }; export default Battle;
